title: Death from amphetamine drug use in England and Wales 1993 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of deaths, containing a total of 26 data points.
Overall Number of deaths has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Number of deaths, of value 100.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of deaths about 19.0 was reached at Year 1994
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of deaths. In total the number of data points it has is 26.
In general Number of deaths has rose over the Year.
mid_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of deaths, containing a total of 26 data points.

The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of deaths. In total the number of data points it has is 26.
Overall Number of deaths has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Number of deaths, of value 100.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of deaths about 19.0 was reached at Year 1994
The line significantly increased by 16.0 from Year 1994 to 1995, and lastly, increased by 23.0 from Year 2001 to 2002.
